document.full_text: the giants continued to shore up defensive positions on the third day of the draft, grabbing a safety and two linebackers, including the  all-american greg jones in the sixth round.
document.title: giants' picks in 2011 n.f.l. draft
lines_and_colors: the giants continued to shore up defensive positions on the third day of the draft, grabbing a safety and two linebackers, including the  all-american greg jones in the sixth round.
